entropic_dust.name: Entropic Dust
description: This white grit hinders a victim's divine power.
**Effect** 1d2 Cha damage, and for the duration of the poison, victim must succeed at a concentration check vs. the poison's save DC to channel positive energy or lay on hands; **Cure** 1 save

ghost_syrup.name: Ghost Syrup
description: This necrotoxin causes a creature to lose corporeal substance.

**Effect** 1d3 Str damage, and each round a victim takes damage from this poison, she has a 50% chance of dropping one held item. If a victim's Strength is reduced to 0 by ghost syrup, the Strength damage becomes Strength drain, and the victim becomes permanently incorporeal. Carried and worn equipment is unaffected and remains corporeal, and the victim can be restored only through a limited wish, miracle, remove curse, or wish spell; **Cure** 2 consecutive saves
**Requirements** {feat/Craft Wondrous Item}, {spell/ethereal jaunt}, creator must have 13 ranks in Craft (alchemy); **Cost** 3,000 gp

lazurite_flakes.name: Lazurite Flakes
description: These dark gray flakes induce ravenous hunger.

**Effect** 1d2 Con damage, and a humanoid who dies while poisoned rises as an uncontrolled ghoul at the next midnight, retaining none of the abilities it possessed in life; **Cure** 2 consecutive saves

memento_mori.name: Memento Mori
description: Memento mori is a powerful hallucinogen that clouds a victim's senses with messages of death.

**Effect** 1d3 Wis damage, and as long as any Wisdom damage from the poison remains, the victim can't distinguish living creatures from undead and can't understand or read any language - spoken words sound like tearful moans and written words seem faded and tattered. While under this effect, the target takes a -5 penalty on saving throws against fear effects and must attempt to save against all spells cast by others, even harmless or beneficial spells; **Cure** 2 consecutive saves
**Requirements** {feat/Craft Wondrous Item}, {spell/unhallow}, creator must have 10 ranks in Craft (alchemy); **Cost** 1,850 gp

quick_rot.name: Quick Rot
description: This smelly toxin causes a victim's flesh to become gangrenous.

**Effect** 1d2 Con damage, and until the Con damage is healed, the victim gains the {umr/stench} universal monster ability. The stench DC is equal to the poison's DC, and creatures who fail their saves are sickened for 1d6+4 minutes. The poisoned creature is not immune to its own stench; **Cure** 1 save

xensh_spores.name: Xensh Spores
description: These Shadow Plane spores inhibit a victim's ability to absorb positive energy.

**Effect** 1d2 Dex damage, and until the Dex damage is healed, the victim regains only half the normal amount of hit points from channeled energy and conjuration (healing) spells; **Cure** 2 consecutive saves
